methods.description: The Disposable Email Checker API does checking on a single email address and returns if it is from a disposable email provider in either JSON or XML format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Return the result in json (default) or xml format.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to check if is from a disposable email provider.

apiDescription: The MailboxValidator Disposable Email Checker API checks if a single email address is from a disposable email provider and returns the results in either JSON or XML format. Refer to https://www.mailboxvalidator.com/api-email-disposable for further information.
